# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="962f1-102">Eroare 550/553 în Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="962f1-103">Atunci când sunteţi departe de casă şi trimiteţi un e-mail la contul conectat utilizând Outlook.com, mesajul de e-mail ar putea întors cu un 550, 553 sau mesajul de eroare releu interzise.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="962f1-104">Verificaţi [setările de sincronizare email](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) la **Setări**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="962f1-105">> **Vezi toate setările de Outlook** > **Mail** > **Sync e-mail**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="962f1-106">Asiguraţi-vă că implicit la adresa este la fel ca numele de domeniu de e-mail.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="962f1-107">Dacă aveţi propriul domeniu de email incluse, schimba-l la outlook.com, live.com, hotmail.com adresa sau.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="962f1-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
